text: Arsen Zylyftari (born 12 March 1990) is an Albanian footballer who most recently played for Skrapari in the Albanian Second Division.Soccerway profile ==Club career== Following Naftëtari Kuçovë's relegation from the Albanian First Division, Zylyftari left the club and went on a short trial with newly promoted Albanian Superliga side Bylis Ballsh, where the signed a four-year contract on 18 July 2015.Zylyftari firmos për dy vite, spikat kamerunasi Mbella Bylisi zyrtarizon tre afrime, projektohen 5 goditje "bombë" ==References== ==External links== * Profile - FSHF Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:People from Skrapar Category:Association football forwards Category:Albanian footballers Category:KF Poliçani players Category:KF Naftëtari Kuçovë players Category:KF Bylis Ballsh players Category:KF Butrinti players Category:KF Skrapari players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian First Division players Category:Albanian Second Division players
title: Arsen Zylyftari
